content:
Prev: Shape tiles Up: Timothy's 3rd Birthday Party Next: Drake with polka-dot ball

Hoops



Nate has just thrown the ball. He and Brandon spent a lot of time playing with Timothy's new basketball hoop; Connie told me they do the same thing at ITC.
Taken Saturday, March 2, 2002.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 883kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/1000s @ F3.2, ISO 400, 38mm
